entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
